WaveSoundBuffer.PhaseVocoder.window

機能/意味
Window size
タイプ
WaveSoundBuffer.PhaseVocoderクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Indicates the window size (frame size) of FFT (Fast Fourier Transform) used inside PhaseVocoder. 　Specify a number that is a power of 2 between 64 and 32768. The default is 4096.
　Increasing this value will increase the resolution in the frequency axis (the pitch will be less likely to be out of order), but will decrease the resolution in the time axis (the sound will be more pronounced).
　Higher values use more CPU. Look for the lowest value that does not reduce the sound quality.
　For a 44.1KHz audio, a window size of about 256 is better. For music, window size = about 4096 would be better.
　Changes to this property take effect when the WaveSoundBuffer.open method is executed.
